output_questions.question: Fixed size box
output_questions.explanation: The div appears as a box 300px wide and 100px tall with a light gray background.

output_questions.question: This is a paragraph with a maximum width.
output_questions.output: This is a paragraph with a maximum width.
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph won't expand beyond 400px in width, even if the container is wider.
The image will stretch to fill the width of its container.

output_questions.question: Short box
output_questions.explanation: The box will always be at least 50px tall, even if the content is less.

output_questions.question: Viewport height
output_questions.explanation: The div's height is 30% of the viewport height.

output_questions.question: Wide box
output_questions.explanation: The box's width is set to 60% of the viewport width.

output_questions.question: Minimum width paragraph
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph will never be less than 200px wide and has a yellow background.

output_questions.question: Auto width
output_questions.explanation: The width is determined by the content or the parent container.
The image's height is fixed at 150px and the width is automatically scaled to keep the aspect ratio.

output_questions.question: Percent width
output_questions.output: Percent width
output_questions.explanation: The box is 80% as wide as its parent and 50px tall.

output_questions.question: This is a very tall paragraph that will be cut off.
output_questions.output: This is a very tall paragraph that will be cut off.
output_questions.explanation: The paragraph cannot grow taller than 20px; extra content will be hidden.

output_questions.question: Square
output_questions.explanation: The div is a 150px by 150px square with a coral background.

output_questions.question: Auto height
output_questions.explanation: The height grows to fit the content.

output_questions.question: Flexible width box
output_questions.output: Flexible width box
output_questions.explanation: The box's width can shrink to 250px or grow to 500px, but not outside that range.

output_questions.question: Small dark box
output_questions.output: Small dark box
output_questions.explanation: A small, square box with a dark background and white text.
